title: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream The interpretation of seeing gold in a dream differs between a man and a woman, as gold in a man’s dream is something very hateful and silver is praiseworthy, but the opposite happens in a woman’s dream, which indicates a lot of kindness and a huge diet. Interpretation of a dream about gold by Ibn Sirin. There are many interpretations for the interpretation of seeing gold in a dream: The scholar Ibn Sirin said about the interpretation of seeing gold in a dream that it will be sadness, delusion, anguish, and many problems. Gold bracelets in a dream indicate the dreamer’s inheritance. Clothes made of gold in a dream indicate Marriages with powerful people. Gold bars in a dream indicate money, but many gold bars in a man’s dream indicate many problems and sorrows. If one sees in his dream that his eyes are made of gold, he may lose his sight. If someone says that his house is made of gold, then fire will strike him. Gold bracelets and rings on a man’s hand in a dream indicate that many problems will arise for this man, because gold in a dream is disliked. A gold jug or bowl in a dream belongs to a man. This vision indicates the man’s marriage. If you see in a man’s dream that he is using gold utensils, then this It means that he does forbidden things. Interpretation of a dream about gold by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi will say about gold in a dream that it is disliked. If someone says in a dream that he melts gold, then this dream indicates undesirable things, which prompts many people to talk about the dreamer. He came in a dream with gold bars This vision shows evil and destruction. A house made of gold in a dream indicates that it is burning. Earrings and bracelets in a woman’s dream indicate joy and happiness in her life. If a man dreams that gold turns into silver, then this vision is good as the man’s circumstances change from worse to better. He is blessed with a lot of money. But the opposite happens when silver turns into gold in a man’s dream, because silver is praiseworthy and gold is hated, so the man’s circumstances change from better to worse. In a woman’s dream, silver turns into gold, and it indicates that she will achieve her goals, marriage, and good offspring. If he sees If a person sees gold in a dream, this indicates a fine and many debts. If a person sees in a dream that he was given gold, then this vision is worthy of praise, because he is given a ruling that is not taken into account. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream a pot or a jug of gold In her room, this vision indicates the date of her approaching marriage. If an unmarried girl dreams that someone gives her a gift of gold, this vision indicates her marriage to a rich man, but he is greedy and has bad morals. If a girl dreams that she is wearing gold bracelets on her hand in the dream, The vision indicates an inheritance for her. For an unmarried woman to dream that she is wearing a golden earring, this vision indicates that she will soon be linked to someone she loves and who loves her. If an unmarried girl dreams that gold turns into silver, this vision indicates her success in her academic life or Her field of work. Interpretation of a dream about gold in a married woman’s dream. Interpretation of seeing gold

title: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding for pregnant, single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding for a pregnant woman: People see many dreams, some of which may seem strange and others familiar, and there are many interpreters who have provided evidence and meanings for these dreams that suit each person according to his social and psychological status and the real life he lives. The dreams that people may see are the dream of breastfeeding. In this article, we will learn about the various websites in interpreting the dream of breastfeeding for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of breastfeeding in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of breastfeeding as one of the praiseworthy dreams or one of the objectionable visions, according to the way of looking at it. , as Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of breastfeeding is not good in most cases. Breastfeeding from the mother’s breast indicates that there is a lot of money on its way to the dreamer. Imam Ibn Shirin’s interpretation of the dream of seeing a man breastfeeding a young child in a dream means that he will get a prestigious job in his real life. Seeing a child A baby breastfeeding, a male, is evidence that the dreamer will get into some trouble. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is breastfeeding a child, this indicates the type of fetus she will give birth to, especially if it is in the first months of pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding For a pregnant woman, it is an indication that this woman thinks a lot about her fetus and cares for it, as she promises to raise him well. Breastfeeding a small child is a good and praiseworthy vision for a pregnant woman, as it is a sign that the time of birth is approaching, and it will be easy and comfortable, God willing. And if a pregnant woman breastfeeds a dead child in her dream This indicates that she will suffer from a serious illness or give birth to a deformed child, and God knows best. Breastfeeding a male child for a pregnant woman indicates that she herself will bear responsibility for her personal financial expenses. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding for a pregnant woman, especially since seeing her breastfeeding a male child from her left breast means that he will be a good child with his parents. And that it will bring happiness and great goodness to the home with its arrival. If the female is breastfeeding, this is evidence of the great goodness that will bring her, and the ease of pregnancy and childbirth, and God knows best. The fact that a woman during pregnancy breastfeeds a child other than her own in her dream indicates that she will be a compassionate and loving woman. And compassionate with her child after birth. Interpretations of a dream about breastfeeding in an unmarried girl’s dream: Seeing an unmarried girl dream about breastfeeding indicates many problems in her life. This vision can be interpreted as an indication that she is close to having intercourse and marrying a good person who has a high status in her life. Society: If she is breastfeeding a child, she shows many worries and anxieties in her life. Breastfeeding a small child for an unmarried woman without milk is an abominable vision that indicates the loss of money, livelihood, honor, and status. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream of breastfeeding: If the woman is married and sees herself breastfeeding a child in a dream and knows that it is him or her son in In reality, this is evidence of the strong feelings she feels towards this child. The dream indicates that she will become pregnant and give birth to a child in the same form as she saw.

Interpretation of dreams about burning my aunt in a dream, burning a person What could be a sign of sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of a dream about applying a mixture to the face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about applying a mixture to the face in a dream. We can search for an interpretation of a dream about applying a mixture to the face in a dream, and it is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are many interpretations that the site explains, citing the interpretations of some working scholars who seek to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream about applying a mixture to the face in a dream. A dream: Getting a stitch on his face in a dream may mean that he is an imaginary character and has abandoned him. If a man sees that he is putting mixtures on his face, this indicates that the dreamer is evading and he should stop doing that. If you see yourself putting mixtures on his face in a dream, this may indicate some The problems that the dreamer may face in his life during this time. If you see a drawing on the face in a dream, it may indicate concealment, distancing, and avoiding responsibility, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about applying makeup to another person in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is applying makeup to another person in the dream, Perhaps it indicates that some defects are hidden in that person, and God knows best. Dreaming of makeup for another person, the dream may indicate that he is a disabled person and should be kept away from them. Seeing another person wearing makeup in a dream could mean that the dreamer will be exposed to deception and lies, and God knows best. It is possible. Seeing another person wearing makeup in a dream indicates an imbalance in the dreamer and the need to seek help from God, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting an earring on the nose in a dream Putting the neck over the nose in a dream may mean that the dreamer has a great interest in himself at that moment. If a nose stud is seen in a dream, this may indicate a promotion at work or a good event that will happen to the dreamer, thanks to God. Seeing a pierced nose in a dream may indicate bad news for the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting artificial teeth in a dreamWhoever sees it In a dream, he is putting on artificial teeth. In a dream, this may indicate the great good that will come to the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the installation of artificial teeth in the dream is evidence of the kindness and love that surrounded the vision in his life at that time. It may mean seeing the installation of artificial teeth in a dream. Artificial teeth in a dream are the end of the adversities and fears that the dreamer faced in her life during those days. Dreaming about putting artificial teeth in a dream may indicate positive changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting dental fillings in a dream: Seeing dental fillings may indicate In a dream, to support and help with the vision’s needs in his life. If you see the position of dental fillings in a dream, this may indicate advice that the dreamer needs from family and friends. Seeing the position of dental fillings in a dream can indicate important things in the dreamer’s life that he needs to maintain. If a person sees himself applying dental fillings in a dream, this may indicate the great effort that the dreamer is making to achieve his goals, thanks to God. title: Interpretation of a dream about a mill in a dream

preview.html: We will learn about the interpretation of dreams and visions of the mill in a dream. Through this article, what we know about the mill is an important tool used by farmers to grind wheat to obtain flour that they cannot do without. You may also be interested in knowing the yellow color in a dream. We will learn about the interpretation of seeing the mill in a dream for a single and divorced man and woman. You may also be interested in the following: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of seeing the mill in a dream Through the following points, we will learn about the interpretation of seeing the mill in a dream: Seeing a windmill in a dream indicates happiness and many good things in the dreamer's life. If he sees the mill in a dream grinding minerals or stones, this indicates poverty, drought and high prices. Either when you see the mill grinding people in a dream, this indicates that there will be strife between people and the establishment of wars. If a sick person sees a windmill in a dream, this indicates a near recovery from illness. But if a prisoner sees the mill in a dream, this indicates comfort and his release from prison. When a person sees in his dream that he is taking flour from the mill, this means that he will hear good news. Interpretation of seeing the mill in a dream For single womenThere are many interpretations of seeing a mill for single women, which we will learn through the following points:When a single woman sees a flour mill in a dream, it shows kindness and a lot of nutrition in her life. But if an unmarried girl sees an electric mill in a dream, this indicates her success and ease of dealing with her in her life affairs. Seeing unmarried women running in water in a dream indicates the end of their fears and worries and solving problems in their lives. If she sees a single stone mill, this indicates that she will soon marry a righteous man. If she sees the mill grinding coffee in a dream, this means that she solves problems in her life. But if a married woman sees in a dream the mill grinding sweets, this means that the married woman will become pregnant and give birth to a new child. But when a married woman sees that a mill Air operated by electricity or water in her home in a dream, this indicates happiness in her life and a lot of sustenance. When a married woman sees in a dream that the mill grinds inedible materials such as stones and iron, this means that there will be disputes and problems in her life. As for if a married woman sees in a dream that the mill is dripping with blood, this indicates the emergence of major problems and disputes between the family. title: What is the most accurate interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying a second wife?  What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation?

preview.html: What lawyers said about the interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying a second: For a woman, if she sees in her dream that her husband is marrying another woman, she begins to think negatively and fear fills her heart and she immediately searches for the meaning of this dream. Clear for your dream. Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying a second: A poor husband, when his wife dreams that she has tied the knot with another woman, the dream indicates wealth and coverage that will come to him, but on the condition that he marries a fat woman in the dream so the dream is interpreted as fertility and abundance of money. When he gets married Being married to an emaciated woman with a thin body, the dream suggests that he is depressed because financial and professional failure will come in the near future. Marrying a sick woman indicates physical weakness or financial poverty and is indicative of many financial losses. If the husband sees himself getting married or marrying a dead woman but she was beautiful The vision is promising and indicates the return of hope again in the husband’s life and the acquisition of things for which he despaired. He will find luck on his side and all his wishes will come true. He should not be thankful to see a husband getting married and marrying a woman in her grave, for his nearness is bad and indicates the fall of his morals, the corruption of his religion, and the practice of adultery in the near future. If the wife is in a constant argument with her husband and she sees him marrying another woman and she is sad In the dream, perhaps the meaning of the dream is due to the dreamer’s deep-rooted fears in her subconscious about being separated from her. The wife wants to continue her life with him and is afraid to have another woman in his life. A woman who does not trust her husband in reality will see this vision in her dream, and this also comes from the subconscious. In reality, the husband may be married, and the woman knows this, and sees it in her dream He will get married while she is crying and screaming. It is desirable to see the husband getting married in a dream with his beautiful and elegant clothes, because the dream here is happy and suggests many good things that will come to the dreamer’s entire family as follows: Or not: The husband can move to work and search for someone who appreciates him professionally and financially. Second: The dreamer’s children will get married if they are young enough to marry and can establish a home. Third: Her social life will change for the better and the husband’s love can be renewed again and they will live a period full of affection and love. When a married woman dreams that her husband is having intercourse with another woman, this symbol is promising and suggests deals and projects. A new one that brings him a lot of money. The vision may indicate that the husband is very interested in his career and this will have wonderful results and the wife will benefit from it. Interpretation of the vision of the husband marrying the second by Ibn Sirin. When the wife dreams of her husband getting married in a dream, she will be pregnant with a new baby, but she must find him happy With the new marriage and he is satisfied with it until the dream appears good. A husband’s marriage in a dream to a virgin girl is better than his marriage to a divorced woman or a widow, because virgin marriage is a sign of opening the doors of life for both parties (for the dreamer and her husband). If a married woman sees that her husband is marrying another woman, and after concluding Marriage contract If the new woman died in the dream, the meaning of the dream indicates unbearable problems and functional difficulties that will occur.

title: What is the interpretation of flying a plane in a dream?

preview.html: A plane flies in a dream. Seeing a plane is one of those visions that raises a lot of controversy and which we find great resonance among contemporary jurists and psychologists. A plane flies in a dream. The vision of boarding a plane expresses the possibility of traveling soon or the presence of rapid changes in the viewer’s life that require him to achieve the greatest possible potential. Of responding and adapting. Whoever sees that he is on an airplane, this indicates the completion of unfinished work and the end of postponed matters, and the situation has changed dramatically and a major change in outlook on life. Driving an airplane and climbing on it is better than getting on and off, and boarding is a sign of elevation, high status, and advancement in positions and advancement. And going up here is also from the point of view of morality and overcoming trivialities. Just as the landing of the plane is evidence of stability and stable living conditions for a period of time, the landing could be in a state of stagnation and deterioration in living conditions for a period ending in the near future. As for the plane falling, there is no good for it. It is interpreted as disasters, misfortunes, poor living, and a reversal of the situation. Flying a plane in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It is worth noting that Ibn Sirin did not mention the importance of the plane, but we can deduce its importance through visions related to riding, traveling, and animals, and this is clear as follows: Driving a plane indicates a long trip. In it, the person achieves what he wants and achieves its fruits. The landing or stopping of the plane is evidence of the steadfastness or stability of the situation, and a person can calm down for a while and then return again, and if he gets off the plane, this indicates that he has not achieved it. Goal or achieving the goal and returning safely. Boarding the plane also indicates closeness to God and good circumstances, returning to reason and justice. Boarding the plane expresses good qualities and noble morals. Boarding the plane is evidence of mockery and farewell. Military planes are extensions or a divine gift or Forces that a person abounds with or that the enemy is aware of, and whoever owns an airplane, these are heavy responsibilities and burdens. Flying a plane in a dream according to Al-Osaimi. Al-Osaimi says that boarding the plane means moving from one country to another and from one place to another, and whoever gets on the plane and rides it has achieved what he wanted and reached his destination. And his goal. Whoever boarded the plane and it landed, his condition stabilized after a period of travel and travel, and if he boarded and said goodbye, this indicates his illness, the approaching death, or separation from loved ones. Whoever saw the plane falling, this will happen to him or a serious crisis will pass, and the familiar plane shows the country from which it took off, or the guests who They are waiting. And if he sees that he has a private plane, then this indicates his personal duties and obligations or special responsibilities. The Almighty says: And the plane in general expresses conditions in its fluctuations and changes, instability in something without an order, and life changes that lift some and tear others apart. What does it mean? Riding a plane in a dream for a single woman? The plane in a dream symbolizes the rapid changes that move her from one place to another, better and the ability to do business on her own.

title: The correct interpretations of seeing the color blue in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the color blue and a blue dress in a dream? It happens that some people may see colors or symbols with distinctive colors in their dreams, and they may think that such a vision does not mean anything, but it carries many interpretations. In this article, we will talk about the interpretation of the color blue in a dream, as mentioned. Interpreters interpret seeing this color in a specific way that differs, and this difference is due to the dreamer’s position in the dream and his social status. We will include in detail the details of the negative and positive aspects of this vision in the article. Blue color in a dream The interpretation may vary according to the feelings that the dreamer feels, whether they are positive or negative, for example if If the color of the sky is blue, the dreamer feels fear and dread, then the interpretation takes the negative side, but if the dreamer sees the color of the sea because he loves it and enjoys the beauty in his vision, then the interpretation of the dream will go far in the positive. Whoever sees this vision and suffers from some obstacles on the way to his future, it is good news that he will overcome all obstacles and achieve his goal, whether on the personal level or in his desire to communicate with a good girl, or on the professional level and gain a prominent social status, but more effort must be made. And the effort to achieve this goal. Seeing a man of this color in his dream shows that he bears many responsibilities and burdens, but he has the ability to carry out all the burdens entrusted to him, and he is an ambitious and persistent personality and does not know the meaning of despair in his life. The color blue in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said in his interpretation This vision is that the blue color expresses the aspirations and dreams that the dreamer seeks to achieve, and the vision can carry other meanings to the contrary, according to the details provided. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream some things in blue, such as the walls of the house or furniture, this is good news that she She is preparing to receive a person who has come to ask for her hand in marriage. this person. He has good qualities that make him worthy of marrying her. A woman seeing this color in her dream, according to Ibn Sirin, can have more than one meaning. Its light color is evidence of its calm, wise and contemplative characteristics. As for the dark blue color, it is an expression of the ill-treatment that she is subjected to from her husband. The blue dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin, narrated by Ibn Shirin. This vision for a girl carries kindness and joy and heralds the imminent date of her engagement, and is the opposite of the case of a married woman, as it turns out that Seeing the same woman taking off a blue dress indicates trouble and anxiety for her. The blue dress in general expresses the psychological state of the dreamer at the present time. If she is happy and cheerful wearing this dress, then this vision is good news for her, and if it is not otherwise and she wants to get rid of this dress, perhaps she will suffer from some problems and will get rid of it soon. The blue dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The blue color in a single woman’s dream. The jurists interpreted the girl’s vision of this. Color as a strong signal of profit, success and profit from trade or work, and it can also indicate success in school stages, because the

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a dead person who eats a living person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream that I buy the dead that eat the living in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of the dream that we buy the dead that eat the living in a dream. This is why you should be careful and not completely believe in their interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about buying a dead person who eats a living person in a dream. Seeing a dead person buying food in a dream for a living person may indicate abundant goodness that will come to the dreamer during this time, thanks to God. Whoever dreams that a dead person was buying for him Food can indicate good things that will come to the dreamer at that time, and God knows best. In the event that a person sees that the deceased was buying food in the neighborhood, this may indicate the inheritance that the dreamer can obtain during this time, thanks to God. In In the case of a dream about buying a dead person’s beard, this may indicate a new job or a job that the dreamer may obtain during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about buying pants for a deceased person in a dream: Seeing a dead person buying pants in a dream could mean that many good things will come to the dreamer thanks to this. The person. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased buys pants in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money thanks to the deceased, and God knows best. Seeing the deceased begging from the neighborhood may indicate the dreamer’s generosity and enjoyment of good health during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision A dead person buys milk in a dreamIf you see a deceased person buying milk in a dream, this may indicate the dreamer’s upcoming kindness and abundant nutrition. A dream about the death of a person giving milk to someone after buying it may indicate happiness and peace that the dreamer enjoys during those days. Anyone who sees in a dream that The deceased was giving him the milk that he bought. This may indicate a serious torment that the dreamer may go through and that he will overcome with the grace of God. Seeing the dead person buying milk in a dream may indicate a crisis that the dreamer is going through and that he will overcome with the grace of God. Interpretation of a dream about my deceased father who gave me watermelon in a dream. Seeing the deceased father giving the dreamer a watermelon may mean that the dreamer is giving alms to the dead person, and God knows best. In the case where we see the deceased father giving the dreamer a watermelon, this could indicate alleviation of the sins and sins committed by the deceased thanks to God’s grace. Seeing a dead father giving the dreamer a watermelon may indicate the alleviation of the sins and sins committed by the deceased thanks to God’s grace. Giving his children watermelon could refer to the good deeds that that person’s children do with God’s grace. Seeing a dead father giving watermelon to his children may indicate charity and supplication that the children offer to their father, thanks to God. He buys me shoes in a dream, as this may indicate rejection of the intense anxiety that the dreamer is suffering from at that time, and God knows best. Seeing a dead person buying shoes in a dream may indicate a desire to fulfill desires and dreams in a big way during these days. In the event that you see a dead person buying shoes Shoes in a dream, this may indicate important changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best.
